subject: Sales
title: Awareness: I Have a Problem
description: A fast breakdown of Awareness: I Have a Problem for builders.

hook.text: Your laptop freezes. You ignore it once, twice, ten times. On the eleventh, you finally search Google.

buildup.text: The awareness stage begins when pain becomes too loud to ignore.

discovery.text: Buyers here aren't looking for products. They want answers: blog posts, videos, expert forums.

twist.text: Sellers who push demos at this stage lose instantly. The buyer isn't ready. They're diagnosing.

climax.text: Win the awareness stage by being the most helpful voice in the room. Teach, don't pitch.

punchline.text: Before buyers want solutions, they need to name the pain.

quiz.question: What do buyers seek during the awareness stage?
